archimate:Grouping.name: AI Machine Learning (in fact 39 services described on the Azure Web site)
archimate:Grouping.documentation:
https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/services/cognitive-services/ink-recognizer/
Ink Recognizer PREVIEW An AI service that recognizes digital ink content, such as handwriting, shapes, and ink document layout
Integrate digital ink recognition into your applications Create application experiences that combine pen and paper interaction with powerful digital capabilities. Recognize digital handwriting, common shapes, and the layout of inked documents for various scenarios like notetaking, form-filling, content search, and document annotation.
Recognize handwriting created in digital ink, in 63 languages and locales.
Identify common polygon shapes in digital ink along with their geometric hot points and layout coordinates.
Enable productivity scenarios, such as converting handwriting to text and making inked content searchable
